hero.subtitle: Streamline workflows, reduce costs, and maximize efficiency with Techn9.

callToAction.title: Kickstart Your Automation Journey with a Free 30-Minute Call
callToAction.subtitle: Let’s explore how Techn9 can help you eliminate bottlenecks, free up your team, and drive results—no strings attached.

items.question: What types of businesses do you work with?
items.answer: We work with businesses of all shapes and sizes—from local property management companies to fast-growing online stores. If you’ve got workflows, we can automate them.

items.question: How long does implementation take?
items.answer: It depends on complexity. Most projects take 2–6 weeks from strategy to launch. We’ll give you a clear roadmap before we start.

items.question: Do you offer support after delivery?
items.answer: Absolutely. We don’t disappear after launch. We offer ongoing support, optimization, and updates to ensure your automations keep delivering value.

items.question: Is my data safe with Techn9?
items.answer: Yes. Data privacy and security are core to our approach. We follow best practices in encryption, permissions, and compliance every step of the way.

workflow.title: Workflow Automation
workflow.description: We identify time-consuming processes and build automations that free up your team to do more meaningful work.

gpt.title: AI Assistant & GPT Solutions
gpt.description: Create smart, natural-language interfaces for your business that improve support, speed up operations, and enhance decision-making.

consulting.title: Automation Consulting
consulting.description: Not sure where to start? We help you identify the best opportunities for automation with an ROI-focused strategy.

strategy.title: AI Strategy Development
strategy.description: Design a clear roadmap for integrating AI into your operations, aligned with your business goals.

process.title: Streamline Your Operations in Four Simple Steps

step1.title: Discovery
step1.description: We begin with a personalized discovery call to understand your unique challenges and goals. Our experts analyze your workflows, pinpoint inefficiencies, and uncover opportunities where AI-powered automation can save you time and reduce costs.

step2.title: Strategy
step2.description: Next, we develop a custom automation strategy tailored to your business. Leveraging advanced tools like n8n, Airtable, and Supabase, we design streamlined workflows and integrations that eliminate repetitive tasks and boost productivity.

step3.title: Implementation
step3.description: Once your solution is ready, our experienced team ensures a flawless, low‑downtime implementation. We integrate the new system smoothly into your operations so you can immediately experience improved efficiency without disruption.

step4.title: Ongoing Support
step4.description: Finally, we continuously fine‑tune your automation solution based on your feedback, ensuring it evolves with your business needs. Our iterative approach guarantees sustained performance and a measurable return on investment.

efficiency.title: Save Time
efficiency.description: Cut down hours of manual work by automating key workflows and recurring tasks.

cost.title: Reduce Costs
cost.description: Optimize staffing and resources with smart systems that scale with your business.

customization.title: Fully Tailored
customization.description: Every automation we build is customized to match your exact needs, tools, and goals.

scalability.title: Built to Scale
scalability.description: Our systems grow with you—no need to rebuild as your team, tenants, or customers increase.

accuracy.title: Fewer Errors
accuracy.description: Improve consistency and eliminate human errors with reliable automation logic.

insights.title: Actionable Data
insights.description: Turn your data into clear reports and insights so you can make smarter business decisions.

ecommerce.title: Scaling Customer Support with AI
ecommerce.overview: An online store cut response times by 60% by integrating a smart chatbot that handled common customer queries automatically.

finance.title: Automating Compliance Reports
finance.overview: We built a system to generate and submit recurring financial compliance reports with zero manual intervention—saving hundreds of hours per year.

retail.title: Personalized Marketing on Autopilot
retail.overview: By combining customer data with AI-driven content creation, this retail client boosted their email click-through rate by 43%.

story.title: Your Trusted Automation Partner
story.description: I am Simon Paris, founder of Techn9. I believe smart, streamlined automation can transform your business. My mission is to help forward-thinking companies save time, reduce costs, and drive sustainable growth with tailored AI solutions. Whether you manage a portfolio of rental properties or lead a growing enterprise, I deliver practical, powerful, and personalized results that truly move the needle.
